Tools For The 21st Century

Get access, get help, create something!

Spaces

The DMC offers a variety of spaces!

We have all the software you'll need and expert help to find the resources you'll need to bring your projects to life or practice your programming.

Try your hand at digital artwork and animations with our drawing tablets and software. Even beginners can have a few stick figures dancing around!

We have lots of hardware and electronics for robots and awesome devices. We can shape anything we need at our wood and metal working stations or 3D print designs from unique plastics.

Check out our recording station to put your first single together or learn how make your own beats.

Images taken from the JHU DMC page as placeholders.
